author: perezhilton
title: Kristen Bell & Dax Shepard Couldn’t Be More Adorable In Throwback Shot From Nearly A Decade Ago!
text:
Aww! Nine years later and we totally believe Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard are as in love as they were when they first got together!
After all, the CHiPs star dedicated a whole Instagram post to his wife of four years on Sunday by sharing a pic from the early years in their relationship (above)!
They couldn't be any cuter!
Related: Kristen & Dax's Golden Globes After-Party Was Lit
And in the caption, the 42-year-old Quote: :
"9 years ago. And unfortunately that bottom lip isn't from injections, it's Skoal. That's right, I landed @kristenanniebell while in the throes of a nasty dip habit. Thanks for being an optimist, honey."
Ha!
Well, it sounds like Kristen is just as smitten as she also dedicated a post to him just an hour earlier! Sharing an adorable moment while in the middle of watching Nocturnal Animals , the Frozen starlet uploaded this clip:
